name: Flaunt Corps
overview:
Located at Faridabad (Haryana, India), we, “Flaunt Corps”, are engaged in trading, supplying and wholesaling a comprehensive range of Cable, HDMI Device, Voltage Converter, Accessories for Apple, etc. These products are manufactured using the best quality raw material and the most advanced techniques by our prestigious vendors in order to meet the set industry norms.

Our Team: Procuring agents Quality controllers Administration & management staff Warehousing personnel Sales & marketing executives

Our Strength: Due to our wide range of Cable, HDMI Device, Voltage Converter, Accessories for Apple etc. We have achieved an outstanding position in the market. Our ethical business practices and client centric approach also assists us in getting an edge over our competitors.

Warehouse Facilities: We have a large warehouse facility over an extensive area and are well connected with rail, road and shipping network. Our unit is compartmentalized into various sections and appropriately labeled for the safe storage and recovery of the finished range. In addition to this, we have selected a trained and skilled warehouse experts for supervising and regulating daily activities.

Vendor Base: To achieve the complete satisfaction of our customers as well as to meet the international quality standards, we procure our products from the certified vendors of the market. We maintain a healthy relationship with our vendors and they also cooperate with us.
